EmailTemplate.description: This email template will be sent to the scheduler when the remaining balance for Text & Phone Reminders is less than or equal to $20 dollars.
EmailTemplate.name: SUMO Balance Notification and Reminders
EmailTemplate.subject: WARNING: Your SUMO Notifications Balance is Low
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!forcebrain__Billing__c.Name},
Your remaining credits for your SUMO Text and Phone Reminders is {!forcebrain__Billing__c.forcebrain__Remaining_Balance__c}. SUMO will cease to send text & phone reminders when your balance reaches $0.
You may purchase more credits in the SUMO App.
1. Click on the + on the far right of the tab menu. 2. Click on SUMO Settings. 3. Click on the Text & Phone Settings. 4. Click on the Payment tab. 5. Complete the form to add funds.
Alternatively, you may contact your ForceBrain.com representative immediately to purchase more credits.
Thank you, SUMO Support 800-708-1790
